definition: Jiahe county in Chenzhou 郴州[Chen1 zhou1], Hunan
Jiahe county in Chenzhou 郴州[Chen1 zhou1], Hunan

sentences.english: The company was previously known as Golden Harvest, but changed its name last year after a merger.
sentences.chinese: 橙天之前名爲嘉禾，去年公司併購後改名。

sentences.english: Good morning. Jiahe restaurant. May I help you?
sentences.chinese: 早上好，嘉禾飯店，我可以幫你嗎？

sentences.english: I went to Golden Harvest Cinema.

sentences.chinese: 瀋陽嘉禾實業有限公司。

sentences.english: Furthermore for this year, the English Club successfully solicited sponsorship from the Golden Harvest Cinema.
sentences.chinese: 此外，英語俱樂部成功獲得嘉禾影院的贊助。

sentences.english: Jiahe Tuhua used in this area has huge internal differences.
sentences.chinese: 湖南嘉禾縣屬於湘南雙方言區，其土話內部差異較大。

sentences.english: Company production base in Guangzhou city for Jiahe Wang Gang Industrial zone.
sentences.chinese: 公司生產基地爲廣州市嘉禾望崗工業區。

sentences.english: The British merchant vessel, SS Kiawo, was camouflaged and armored at Ichang.
sentences.chinese: 英國商船“嘉禾”號在宜昌被裝甲和僞裝。

sentences.english: Jiahe County is a bi-dialectal area in south Hunan Province. Jiahe Tuhua used in this area has huge internal differences.
sentences.chinese: 湖南嘉禾縣屬於湘南雙方言區，其土話內部差異較大。

definition: Longfeng district of Daqing city 大慶|大庆[Da4 qing4], Heilongjiang
to engrave (on wood or stone)/to inscribe
Chibi county level city in Xianning 咸宁市, Hubei/Chibi or Red Cliff in Huangzhou district 黃州區|黄州区 of Huanggang city 黄冈, Hubei, scene of the famous battle of Red Cliff of 208
reign name (1909-1911) of the last Qing emperor Pu Yi 溥儀|溥仪
flat silver (former coinage)/also written 銀元|银元/silver dollar
Dongbao district of Jingmen city 荊門市|荆门市[Jing1 men2 shi4], Hubei
see 泰和縣|泰和县[Tai4 he2 xian4]
Huanghuagang (Chrysanthemum Hill) in Guangzhou, scene of disastrous uprising of 23rd April 1911
